main event: Observers reported seeing a bright whitish light that hovered and moved in the sky, displaying rapid changes in course and intensity.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 15-20 minutes,The object was first seen as a bright light resembling a falling star,It stopped and hovered several times during the observation,The object changed shape as it accelerated, and one witness reported that it looked like a bubble floating in the air,The observers were a major, his wife, and an airman at Ernest Harmon AFB.
sighted object: a bright whitish light in the sky
witness description: a major, his wife, and an airman
